::: {.course-overview}
# Course Overview

This course provides a very brief introduction to the Julia programming language. It is not meant to teach Julia coding, only to get you started with using Julia.

:::


::: {.course-goals}
# Course Goals

* Know what Julia is.
* Be able to run Julia.
* Have basic understanding of how to run code in Julia.

:::

::: {.course-prerequisites}
# Course Prerequisites

* We assume you have Positron up and running and can use it at the level covered in our _Brief Introduction to Positron_ course. 

:::




::: {.course-content}
# Course Content

The course covers these topics (and more).

- Overview of Julia
- Install and setup of Julia
- Basics of Coding in Julia
- Using Julia environments
- Using Julia through Positron
- Further Resources
:::
